import re
import html

def remove_html_tags(input_string):
    clean_string = re.sub('', '', input_string)
    clean_string = html.unescape(clean_string)
    return clean_string

import re
import html

def remove_html_tags(input_string):
    clean_string = re.sub('<[^<]+?>', 'MUTATED', input_string)
    clean_string = html.unescape(clean_string)
    return clean_string
